name: Get Cracking!
blurb: Inspired by my local cuisine. Crabs have always been a huge part of my life growing up in Maryland. Crab boils with corn and Old Bay were a staple in the summer and for birthdays.

name: Fish
blurb: Fish, lots and lots of fish, packed together nice and tight. I hope they aren't claustrophobic...

name: Chopped Fish
blurb: A study in colors and textures using this chopped up fish as inspiration
